scripts.postinstall: cd strapi && npm install && cd ../next && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n strapi,next,sync,backup -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "cd strapi && npm run dev" "cd next && npm run dev" "chokidar './strapi/public/uploads/**' -c 'rsync -av --delete ./strapi/public/uploads/ ./next/public/uploads/' --initial" "npm run backup"
scripts.build: concurrently -n strapi,sync,build -c blue,yellow,green --kill-others --success command-2 "cd strapi && npm run dev" "chokidar './strapi/public/uploads/**' -c 'rsync -av --delete ./strapi/public/uploads/ ./next/public/uploads/' --initial" "sleep 8 && rm -rf ./next/.next && cd next && npm run build" && npx serve ./next/out
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./next/out
